description: Waylla Kuri is an indigenous association in Ecuador focused on organic coffee production, particularly robusta coffee. With 33 legal partners and 300 commercial partners, they manage 42,000 hectares using the ancestral chacra system, which promotes biodiversity and sustainability. The initiative aims to achieve food security and financial sustainability for the community, emphasizing solidarity, community values, and fair trade practices. They seek to expand their market presence while preserving their cultural heritage and environmental practices.
name: Waylla Kuri
